201.title: Mickey & Toya: Two Wrights Make a Marriage Wrong
201.plot: Mickey and Toya Wright had a picture-perfect marriage until Toya found photos of naked women on Mickey's camera. These two won't let go of the bling without making the other feel the sting, so they need Vikki's help to fairly divide their assets.

202.title: Andy & Meredith: Zen and the Art of Marriage Maintenance
202.plot: After five years, Andy and Meredith have hit a major roadblock. When Meredith took up yoga, Andy took off on his motorcycle in the opposite direction. Vikki's client Josephine needs Vikki to secure a prenuptial agreement for her daughter.

203.title: Jim & Stacey: The Belle and the Bachelor
203.plot: Despite their good looks, Jim and Stacey are not a model couple. They need Vikki to divide their assets and help them move on with their lives. Meanwhile, Vikki's client Cynthia finds out she was never legally divorced from her husband.

204.title: Keith & Andre: This Little Piggy Went to Mediation
204.plot: After 25 years of sharing everything, Andre realized there was one thing Keith would never share: a desire to be a dad. With so much history, they need Vikki to untangle their knots and help them go their separate ways. When it comes to their marital assets, they don't want anything to go to market, including their potbelly pig named Priscilla, a vintage silverware collection, an impressionist painting, two voodoo altars, and their marital home and business headquarters. When Keith walks out of mediation, Vikki has to be creative if she's going get them to agree to ...

205.title: Libby & Perry: War of the Rosie
205.plot: Libby and Perry were living a dream, but when the real estate market crashed so did their marriage. Perry started binge-drinking and would disappear for weeks on end, leaving Libby all alone with their dog Rosie. After 3 years in limbo, they need Vikki's help to end their marriage and divide their $20,000 gold coin collection, a $10,000 screen from the Ming Dynasty, a unique hand-blown glass bowl, and custody of their beloved dog Rosie. Vikki has to make a tough decision when the mediation turns into the War of the Rosie. Meanwhile, things get sticky for Vikki's ...

206.title: Tonya & Tullio: He's Fast, She's Furious
206.plot: Tonya and Tullio fell in love in the fast lane. But after 6 years of marriage, they realized they blew through too many red lights. Now they need Vikki's help dividing their $24,000 jewelry collection, a Fiat Abarth, a mid-century furniture set, and a $70,000 art collection. When they each make a grab for the other person's stuff, Vikki has to get them to shift gears and slow down if she's going to get them divorced. Meanwhile, Vikki encourages her former client Kim to jump back into the dating game after going through a difficult divorce.

207.title: Nikka and Dave: Big Trouble in Sin City
207.plot: When Dave and Nikka met at a party in Las Vegas, they made the biggest bet of their lives and got married. But after 14 years, Dave wants to cash in and get divorced while Nikka is still holding onto her cards. They need Vikki's help to end their marriage and split up a $250,000 Lamborghini, an $18,000 statue, and their $1.3 million property in Maui. It's going to take some high-stakes gambling for Vikki to get these two agree to her recommendations. In another deal gone wrong, Vikki's client Tom is desperate to get back $65,000 he had given to his ex-girlfriend for ...

208.title: Tom and Darlene: Law and Disorder
208.plot: Tom and Darlene fell in love in law school, but after 24 years of marriage the verdict is that they need to split up. They've been estranged for more than a decade and only stayed together for their son. When it comes their marital assets, they both make convincing arguments for a signed Salvador Dali print, $20,000 photographs, and a bronze Buddhist statue. Things heat up when Tom threatens to walk out of mediation if he doesn't get his way, but Vikki stays calm and makes her final judgment. Meanwhile, sparks fly at Vikki's monthly dating mixer where divorced singles...

1.title: Battle of the Buddha Head
1.plot: Jacques and Mira might look like models, but their marriage is far from picture-perfect. After six years, they've decided to call it quits. They need Vikki's help to decide who walks away with a giant Buddha head, an apartment in Paris, and a diamond ring.

2.title: Passport for Divorce
2.plot: After 13 years, Jennifer and Golan haven't been very lucky in love and have decided to call Vikki to help end their marriage and divide their assets. These two are stuck in a real crisis and are clinging to a historically significant antique passport, a diamond necklace, a painting by a famous artist, and five income-producing properties.

3.title: The War of the Weiss's
3.plot: After returning from a tour of duty in Iraq, Tim wasn't the same person Kelly fell in love with, and his PTSD issues have taken a heavy toll on their marriage. Although neither really wants to be divorced, Kelly is ready to go AWOL, so they've called Vikki to help divide and appraise their assets. The couple is shocked when they hear how much their stuff is really worth.

4.title: To D or Not to D
4.plot: After 26 years of marriage, Emily and Dave have come to a crossroads. As Vikki tries to determine a fair distribution of assets and gets to know this couple better, she decides they may not be ready to divorce and shifts from mediating their assets to negotiating a last ditch effort to save their marriage.

5.title: A Date for Divorce
5.plot: Krissy and Tina have spent 11 years together. However, soon after building their dream home, their marriage hit the rocks when Krissy and Tina became Krissy and Tina and Amy. Vikki's about to lay down the law but when all is said and done, she could be the one who ends up in the dog house.

6.title: From Wedding Couture to Marriage Detour
6.plot: Stuart and Iret have decided it's time to end their marriage after 26 years. Stuart spent his life on the road as a wedding couture salesman, making other people's wedding dreams come true, while his own marriage hit the rocks. It's going to take a miracle for Vikki to determine a fair settlement.

imdb.plot outline: When couples go from 'I do' to 'I don't' Vikki Ziegler is who they call to mediate, advise and divide their assets out of court. Why let a judge decide your fate when the Divorce Diva can cut through all the drama to determine who will get what?
imdb.title: Untying the Knot
plot: When couples go from 'I do' to 'I don't' Vikki Ziegler is who they call to mediate, advise and divide their assets out of court. Why let a judge decide your fate when Vikki can cut through all the drama to determine who will get what?::Bravo!
